column4: hi! i made good experiences (get better languyage skills) with streamtuner & streamripper to capture audio streams. Is there any analogue for ONLINE tv video streams ?
if you have shoutcast tv dir, you can use mplayer to view the .nsv links
noeljb: see ubuntu+1 channel, it is being worked on
i was visiting some online-link through opera, kaffeine opened it by default, but there was no chance to record, this would be important for me to analyze the sound... (with video, life is easy)
